author: Jayneysuk
title: Great Minifigure, Cheaper Way To Obtain.
review: Compared to other foil bags, this comes with a very quality minifigure, with VERY intricate layered printing. (More unique Imperials are always great for any collector of the galactic empire) that only appeared in one other set. That set being from one of the most unsought-after sub themes, rebels. Having a cheaper way to get him is great, as pilots are generally hard to army build in Star Wars, and due to his fairly generic imperial design, he could fit nicely in any ground vehicle or large scale battle. Blaster is also always a welcome addition in a SW minifigure set, being a very versatile accessory. Very good minifigure, bonus points for not being farmboy Luke.
